properties.property: [Character [Enemy Kyla] Rightward True [Sequence [[FadeOutSong 2000] [Wait 120] [PlaySong 2000 0 0.5 0 [Field TheCalling]] [Wait 180] [Dialog "Always. They have always treated me this way..."] [Face [CharacterTarget [Enemy Kyla]] Downward] [Dialog "Things cannot be put right. Things can only be put in my favor. "] [Dialog "You are either the spider or you are the fly."] [Dialog "A lifetime of poison is what she gave to me; I shall give it all back to her in one moment!"] [Dialog "Aranea's poison is tasteless and unidentifiable."] [Dialog "In my master's nightly herbal brew shall I serve it."] [Dialog "Upon her death by the morn, by the custom of succession, I will take her stead."] [Dialog "Imagine their faces when they see the lowest servent become the highest... their victim become their tormentor..."] [Face [CharacterTarget [Enemy Kyla]] Rightward] [Dialog "Things could not be put right..."] [FadeOutSong 2000] [Wait 120] [ReplaceAdvent [KylaAdvent 1] [KylaAdvent 2]] [PlaySong 2000 0 0.5 0 [Castle CastlePart1]] [PlaySound 0.5 [Field ChestOpen]] [Dialog "Something unlatched..."]]] [[KylaAdvent 1]]]
